value.fullName: No hernia identified on physical exam
value.label: No hernia identified on physical exam

value.fullName: Patient understands that they need to maintain their body weight to achieve optimal results
value.label: Patient understands that they need to maintain their body weight to achieve optimal results

value.fullName: Patient understands some temporary nerve sensations may be present and that use of spandex clothing immediately post procedure may minimize discomfort.
value.label: Patient understands some temporary nerve sensations may be present and that use of spandex clothing immediately post procedure may minimize discomfort.

value.fullName: Patient cautioned to remain still during the procedure so as to not dislodge the coolsculpting device
value.label: Patient cautioned to remain still during the procedure so as to not dislodge the coolsculpting device
